name: Trapmill
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 2018 global game jam, Trapmill is a competitive 2D platformer where 2 players try to climb a scrolling level while placing traps to trip eachother up.  Don't touch the top or bottom of the screen. Have fun! Requires two XINPUT controllers (Xbox and similar controllers). 

Jam page with full credits: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/trapmill

Controls: 

Left analog stick: Move left and right 

A: Jump 

X: Place trap

Left and Right shoulder bumpers: Switch trap 

B (when dead): Respawn
